functions.meaning: Return all codes known in this terminology.
functions.name: all_codes

functions.meaning: Return all codes under grouper 'a_group_id' from this terminology.
functions.name: codes_for_group_id

functions.meaning: Return all codes under grouper whose name in 'a_lang' is 'a_name' from this terminology.
functions.name: codes_for_group_name

functions.meaning: True if  a_code' is known in group  group_id' in the openEHR terminology.
functions.name: has_code_for_group_id

functions.meaning: Return all rubric of code  code' in language  lang'.
functions.name: rubric_for_code

meta_info.description: Defines an object providing proxy access to a terminology.
meta_info.name: TERMINOLOGY_ACCESS
